titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that reports from the Committee on Ways and Means accompanying revenue bills with targeted tax benefits clearly identify those benefits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Rules and Organization of the House.

bill.summary: 4/6/1995--Introduced. Amends rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require each report of the House Committee on Ways and Means on each revenue bill that includes any targeted tax benefit (providing a Federal tax deduction, credit, exclusion, preference, or other concession to 25 or fewer beneficiaries) to clearly identify, in a separate section, each such benefit, the number of beneficiaries, and their names (if known).
